LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsScaledSpawnTimeButto: Scale spawn time to pawn combat power
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsFixedSpawnTimeButton: Fix spawn time to certain amount
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsScaledSpawnTimePoint: Scaled spawn interval points per second: {0}
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsFixedSpawnTimeSecond: Fixed spawn interval seconds per spawn: {0}
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsCachePawns: Cache spawned pawns for each spawner until chosen pawn kind changes
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsUseAllyFaction: Assign spawned pawns to a custom ally faction instead of the player faction
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsDisableCorpses: Disable spawned pawn corpses and dropped items
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsSpawnOnThreats: Spawn pawns only when threats are detected
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsSpawnOnThreatsSpeedM: Spawning speed multiplier when initially spawning in reaction to threats: {0}
LanguageData.RimSpawners_SettingsSpawnInDropPods: Spawn pawns in drop pods near enemies
LanguageData.RimSpawners_PawnSelectionDesc: Select the type of creature to spawn
LanguageData.RimSpawners_UniversalAssemblerInspectCho: Chosen to fabricate {0}. Current creatures are using {1}/{2} control points.
LanguageData.RimSpawners_UniversalAssemblerInspectLim: Chosen to fabricate {0}. Current creatures are using up all {1} control points. Fabrication is paused until control points are available.
LanguageData.RimSpawners_UniversalAssemblerInspectDor: \nAssembler is dormant until a threat is detected.
